name: beaded möbius strip fidget
notes:
crafty intentions free crochet pattern beaded möbius strip fidget (printable pdf-file / 39 pages)

developed by megan lapp aka crafty intentions, this pattern is for beaded möbius strip fidgets! this pattern is written in u.s. terminology.

this pattern comes with instructions to make beaded möbius strip fidget!! the pattern comes with instructions for three sizes of fidget - small (2x2 inches), medium (3x3 inches) and large (4x4 inches.  it comes with 2 beading options - lightly beaded or heavily beaded.  and it comes with an explanation for how to attach the beads in three different ways, embedding one bead, placing 1 bead on top of the work, or attaching 2 beads at a time on both and the front and back of the work. everything you see in the photos is included in the pattern. all instructions are carefully depicted with words and photos! this pattern features clear step by step instruction with a lot of row-by-row photos. the gauge is not crucial to the pattern as long as the stitches are tight enough to hold stuffing.

this pattern is a total of 39 pages containing a full set of written instructions with photographic illustrations, and there are video tutorials for particular steps and stitches available on my youtube channel. this pattern consists of one pdf file, and the last 10 pages include 7 pages of text-only, printer-friendly instructions and 3 pages of the eu safety and compliance document, but i strongly recommend you still refer to the photographic illustrations throughout the pattern if you have any questions.

this pattern is available in english.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

size

a small möbius strip fidget from this pattern is approximately 2 x 2 inches, a medium möbius strip fidget is approximately 3 x 3 inches, a large möbius strip fidget is approximately 4 x 4 inches.

… … … … … … … … … … … … … .

supply list

yarn, in worsted weight, all amounts are approximate. this pattern requires a yardage range of 20
to 50 yards of worsted/medium/4 weight yarn depending on the options used.
small möbius strip fidget: approximately 20 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn
medium möbius strip fidget: approximately 30 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn
large möbius strip fidget: approximately 40 - 50 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn
**note: yardage varies slightly based on bead usage. increasing bead usage increases the yardage.

e (3.5mm) or g (4.0mm) hook (or similar that will fit through the hole of your chosen beads)

2 stitch markers

darning needle to weave in end

beads:
for a lightly beaded möbius strip fidget:
small: 16 beads (row 1 – 5)
medium: 32 beads (row 1 – 7)
large: 64 beads (row 1 – 9)

for a heavily beaded möbius strip fidget
small: 32-64 beads (row 1 – 5)
medium: 64-128 beads (row 1 – 7)
large: 96-192 beads (row 1 – 9)

to see what beads i’ve personally tried and liked: [https://www.amazon.com/shop/craftyintentions][1]

… … … … … … … … … … … … … .

skill level

• suitable for beginner skill level or above (a 2.5 on the scale of difficulty for crafty intentions patterns)
• pattern contains clearly explained instructions for each round
• many step-by-step photos

… … … … … … … … … … … … … .

additional notes

**this pattern has been tested!**

all patterns can be crocheted by right-handed and left-handed crocheters without alteration. the photos will appear to be a mirror image of what a left-handed crocheter will make.
